data.message: how do i get an answer as to why a video was taken down?

replies.message: Hey there, Anna. You can learn more about why your video might have been removed here: http://bit.ly/2bnz5JK. Thanks. -Jordan

Dear Jordan this doesn't answer my question of why it was removed I just want to know what part was a violation cause the video is a dance number done by the prowlers and they upload videos all the time of them dancing to songs. was it that particular song or what that's all i need to know and the email doesn't let me ask. can you help. i know i never had a problem before until this one.
